Welcome to Bahamaland.

Dreamers building an algorithmic archipelago.
Better in The Bahamas. Meta in Bahamaland.
Decentralised. Autonomous. Organised. Bahamian.

What is Bahamaland?

We are a decentralised and autonomous organisation that exists to advance the interests of all Bahamians. Bahamaland is unaffiliated with the government of The Bahamas. It exists in parallel, as an emergent digital nation.

Why Bahamaland?

Benefits:

  • Decentralised - You own your citizenship. It cannot be taken away by the government, or any other human. You have to claim it yourself (or renounce it).
  • Autonomyous - We are unbound by the governmentâ€™s laws. This gives us the freedom to make decisions and take action as we see fit. The only limits are our own self-authored constitution, and the laws of physics.
  • Democratic - Each decision is validated by a majority vote. This ensures the nation is ruled by its citizens, and never the reverse.
  • Distributed - Bahamaland is connected by the blockchain. Everyone can cooperate timelessly from their preferred location without missing a beat.
  • Organised - Form follows function in Bahamaland. There are no staff. No office buildings. No overheads. Each goal is accomplished on an ad hoc basis, and expenses are wound down to zero.
  • Rewarded - Earn rewards simply for pledging your allegiance to the flag. Each registered Bahamian will receive 100 $BAHA governance tokens per month. Although intended for voting, they can also be sold, swapped, traded, or shared. There is currently no cost to becoming a citizen of Bahamaland.
